name: Spotify Design's Remote Design Sprint Template
description:
An all-inclusive Figma template for your next remote design sprint


So you don’t have to start from scratch, here’s a Spotify Design Figma file modified into a template for any distributed team to use for their next remote design sprint.


With the help of classic design sprint resources (credited in the final page of the file), Spotify Designer Alexandria Goree created this branded template as a framework for anyone to edit based on what they want to achieve in their remote design sprint.


It includes pages for:

  • an agenda
  • insights artifacts
  • lightning talk slides
  • problem framing and ideation exercises
  • prototypes and
  • research planning
  • and joy bringing Spotify Design highlight assets to use across your workshops.
